item.title: 遊戲紀錄
item.description: 最近遊戲紀錄 Switch 薩爾達傳說-曠野之息 異度神劍2 & 黃金之國 星露谷物語 空洞騎士 PC 天命奇御 Terraria Stardewvalley and Terraria are kill time.

item.title: Errorless in radio comm
item.description: ACM Adaptive Coding Modulation Fixed bandwidth Modulation order and code rate varied with MSE in receive end Example: 28 MHz(BW) QAM Throughput(~=) 128 170 Mbps 64 140Mbps note: code rate should also to be considered If ACM mode is set to auto, ACM radio scripts will be switched to a compatible profile for keeping predefined BER.
